Translations.Text: Mi neniam permes them witness creation de heavens ter nor creation de themselves! Nor do mi permes wicked work My kingdom
Tag ven when Li dir Vok My partners vi pretend est di Me ili vok sur them ili ne respond them. insurmountable barrier separate them el each ali
Kulp vol seg Infer realize ili fal gxi! Ili ne hav escape therefrom
Ni cited en this Quran cxiu kind da ekzempl human est est plej argumentative creature
(Nothing prevent popol el kred when guidance ven them streb forgiveness de their Lord ke ili postul seg sam kind da mirakl) previous generaci challenged seg retribution beforehand
Ni nur send messengers simply deliverers bon news tro warners. Those disbelieve argue falsehood defeat truth ili sorb My proofs warnings en vain

Who est evil than those reminded de their Lord's proofs tiam disregard them sen realizing ki ili doing Consequently ni ej sxild their kor prevent them kompren gxi (Quran) deafness their orel! Tiel ne materi ki vi do direkt them ili neniam ever direkt
your Lord est Forgiver plen de mercy. Li vok them kont por their deeds Li annihilate them tre tie kaj tiam Instead Li don them respite specif predetermined temp tiam ili neniam escape
Many community ni annihilated their transgressions; ni designated specif temp their annihilation
Moses dir al his servant mi ne ripoz mi reach pint kie 2 river meet ne materi kiel long gxi pren
When ili reached pint kie ili met ili forges their fisx gxi trov its voj dors river sneakily
Post ili pas ke pint li dir al his servant hav lunch All this vojagx thoroughly exhausted us
Li dir Memor when ni sid rok dors tie Mi ne pag attention al fisx. est diabl far me forges gxi gxi trov its voj dors river strangely
Moses dir est met ni rigard Ili spur their sxtup dors
Ili trov unu de our servants ni ben kun mercy, bestowed him our own knowledge
Moses dir al him mi sekv vi ke vi instru me kelk da knowledge guidance bestowed upon vi
Li dir Vi ne star est me
Kiel vi star ke vi ne comprehend
Li dir Vi trov me DI testament pacient. Mi ne disobey any ordon vi don me
Li dir vi sekv me tiam vi ne pet me anything mi choose tell vi gxi
Tial ili ir. When ili boarded sxip li bor tru gxi. Li dir vi bor tru gxi Did dron its popol? Vi committed io terrible
Li dir mi ne dir vi star cannot est me
Li dir mi est sorry Ne pun me my forgetfulness; ne est tro harsh me
Tial ili ir. When ili met jun knab li killed him. Li dir vi kill such innocent ul who ne kill another ul? Vi committed io horrendous
